title: Alfryde the Nightmare Rider By SteamPowerLemon
body:
(melee) (mana)

_Roles_:
Fighter, Assassin

_Base Stats_:
Health: 586 (+93 per level) Health Regen: 8.8 (+0.78 per level)
Mana: 326 (+40 per level) Mana Regen: 7.34 (+0.5 per level)
Attack Damage: 60.8 (+3.1 per level)
Attack Speed: 0.665 (+3.1% per level)
Movement Speed: 350
Armour: 25.8 (+3 per level)
Magic Resist: 32.1 (+1.25 per level)

_Abilities_:
Passive: Momentum: Moving grants stacks of Fleet which grant movement speed; at 100 stacks Alfryde's next basic attack will deal bonus magic damage. Stacks rapidly decrease while not moving.

Q: Purge: Alfryde swings his glaive in an arc from the right dealing physical damage and slowing enemies in a cone; Alfryde can cast Purge a second time within 3 seconds and swing from the left, amplifying the slow.

W: Shadowstep:
Passive: Alfryde can move through units.

Active: Alfryde becomes untargetable for a very small amount of time.

E: Sanctify: Alfryde dashes to a location, dealing magic damage and terrifying any champions he collides with.

Ultimate: Living Nightmare: Alfryde summons two spectral riders on either side of him. The riders will follow next to him and avoid unit collision. They will mimic all of Alfryde's abilities increasing their effectiveness. They are both invulnerable to abilities and will block skillshots but can be killed by auto attacks or turrets.

replies.body:
So lets see.

Passive Single target Stun.
AoE, 2 shot Cone slow (Q)
Untargetable with a move speed increase.
A Dash with a Fear on it.
And an ult that turns you into hecarim.

Yeah this is just as overloaded.
I see what you mean I will tone it down a bit. I'm still thinking about his passive and his w. thanks for the feedback.
